p: In The DISTRICT COURT of the SECOND JUDICIAL DISTRICT
Holding Terms at Montesano, in, and for the County of Chehalis.
The TERRITORY of WASHINGTON, PLAINTIFF. VS. Robert Stauglaud DEFENDANT. } INDICTMENT.

We Robert Strauglaud as Principal, and Charles N Byles and TJ Shamley as Sureties, acknowledge ourselves to owe and be indebted to the Territory of Washington in the just and full sum of Four Hundred Dollars, lawful money of the United States of America, to be levied of our Goods and Chattels, Lands and Tenements, upon the following conditions:

WHEREAS, The said Robert Stauglaud has been duly indicted by the Grand Jury of Chehalis County, in the Second Judicial District of Washington Territory, for the following crimes of towit on three separate indictments one for riot and two for malicious mischief, in said County, and is now under arrest upon a warrant duly issued upon each of said indictments.

Now, therefore, if the said Robert Strauglaud shall be and appear in his proper person at the next regular term of said Court, to be holden in and for said Chehalis County, and from term to term thereafter, and
